page.title: 17ST. BEDES "GORAM FAIR"
page.content: Once a year, St. Bedes has a{fund {raising event}for the school called {GORAM FAIR.}A chairman is elected out of the{Parent Teacher Association.}The person then organises the events for the year. { GORAM FAIR}has many stalls and side shows eg. Hoop-la, White Elephant, Skittles, etc. Events also take place at GORAM FAIR eg "It's a Knockout", Fencing and many others. The fair raises more money for the school to buy more equipment, because the grant for the equipment is not sufficient. { GORAM FAIR}is also very good because it attracts all the local people. In this area there are not many such events so they are well supported. Lots of people like to help organise our school events which is good because much help is needed. St. Bedes School
